**News & Updates**

Moss will present an abstract of her research, Petrologic and Geophysical Synthesis of the Magmatic System at Akutan Volcano, at the American Geophysical Union Annual Meeting on 12/18

Moss will present with Dr. Xiaotao Yang on Akutan Volcano at the SZ4D-supported workshop "Research Prioritization in the Alaska-Aleutian Arc" on 12/14

Moss won the 2025-2026 Jack Kleinman Memorial Grant for Volcanology to support her field work in Yellowstone National Park
